EmailTemplate.subject: FalconConnect Access Request Need More Information {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName}, Thank you for requesting access to FalconConnect data for {!Case.Description}.
Based on the information in your registration, we can not locate any active FalconConnect services for {!Contact.Account_Name__c}.
If you can provide more information, such as active aircraft(s) or type of service you subscribe to; I will be happy to check further.
If you have any questions or need further assistance, please reply to to this email and be sure to include your {!Case.CaseNumber} when sending your reply.
Thank you and regards,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
FalconConnect
Account Services
